CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 23, 1954, pg. 15., reads: "Vice President Richard M. Nixon swung himself around with the crowd during his busy visit in Pittsburgh Tuesday... Bottom right: faithful ladies of the court, Mrs. Ora Simms, Mrs. V. W. Day and Mrs. Margaret Hardy. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. Ora Simms, Mrs. V. W. Day and Margaret Handy wearing dark fur jacket, and holding camera, posed behind rail with building in background for Richard Nixon's visit to Pittsburgh
